name: In My Room (anyBooks)
description:
General Information

  • Presented by anyBooks Studio
  • This game created for The Indie Tales Jam 
  • Create / Develop by Somlerk K.
  • Special thank for : 
    • Michael Long for Free Draw Package
    • Chatchakan Y. for QC story
    • Supalers K. for Sound adviser
  • Software by
    • Unity 2021.1.14f1
    • FL Studio 20
    • GIMP 2.10.24

Story

This is the story of Bobby, the guy who is really boring about his life. All the thing is the same as previous days. Bobby lives in his room for a long time and nothing special. But one day, he found a box that contains something strange. He opens it up and gets hurt in his eyes. Something change. Something like… my eyes. He can see the colors of things that he looks interested in. He plays music include Guitar, Drum, and Bass. He starts drawing the picture. He starts to plant the tree. He starts to read the book from the old shelter book. Finally, he found the meaning of life. The same room that he lives for a long time. It was remarkable, as same as the first day that he came to this room. So, it time to go outside his room and begin his journey.

Main Objective

Play 3 things in Bobby room

  • Play music
  • Draw the picture
  • Plant the tree
